description: A smarter cd command. Supports all major shells. (git version)
notes:
This is the git version.
This conflicts with main's zoxide. so i remove it in the start.
Go to https://github.com/shunsambongi/clink-zoxide if you want to see how to set up the z and zi aliases in cmd, clink is also needed for that
And fzf is also needed to use the zi command
